channel.title: Log on The Great Garage
channel.description: Recent content in Log on The Great Garage

item.title: Recent Changes of The Great Garage 1
item.description: I made a personal page for myself and put it under the root of hgao.net. I have considered to move the blog under blog.hgao.net, but it seems that I’ll lose all my links and comments (though only a few at all).
